content:
MAC M1 实测 开源虚拟机软件 UTM，安装及使用KALI LINUX

MAC M1 开源虚拟机

UTM app
https://getutm.app

KALI LINUX

Works Kali Linux 2023.1, update the display, after seria is removed and added again.

install app in Kali

How to Boost TX Power for Wi-Fi in Kali Linux

how to copy and paste to UTM Kali Linux?
$ sudo apt install spice-vdagent
https://docs.getutm.app/guest-support/linux/

CD/DVD Eject, works!
Run the https://miloserdov.org/?p=7533

生成密码字典
https://github.com/r35tart/RW_Password
此项目用来提取收集以往泄露的密码中符合条件的强弱密码

在线工具

https://www.bugku.com/mima/#

本地工具

file:///Users/carlzeng/WebstormProjects/SocialEngineeringDictionaryGenerator/index.html

感谢列表

minidwep-gtk at Kali Linux
How To Install Kali Linux 2022 On M1 / M2 Mac Using UTM (EASY WAY)
使用Kali的wifite和aircrack-ng联合破解wifi密码
